verbs.description: [ARG0: Ted Cruz] [V: writes] [ARG1: a blurb for Time Magazine paying tribute to Donald Trump , who smeared Cruz ’s wife and father and called him a liar] .

Ted Cruz writes a blurb for Time Magazine paying tribute to [ARG0: Donald Trump] , [R-ARG0: who] smeared Cruz ’s wife and father and [V: called] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: a liar] .
